info.name: Tolerable Tumblr
info.description:
This isn't a reversion back to the old layout tumblr had, it just makes the new layout more tolerable.
  • Removes avatar icons and hides the urls of reblog captions. You can hover over the caption to show the url.
  • Reblog captions are darker than the OP caption, providing differentiation between the OP and reblogs that the new layout does not.
  • New captions are marked on the left with a blue line.
To update your settings if the button below does not say "Update with Stylish": refresh this page, input your new settings, and click on the update button. Make sure to check the Notes section below for updates. Choose from the below:
info.additionalInfo:
UPDATE (Sep 5 2015 21:32 PST) I fixed some of the things that made Firefox not work with this style. Message me through my tumblr ask if you're a Firefox user and find any other problems! UPDATE (Sep 5 2015 12:00 PST) Images in reblog captions no longer take up the full width of the post. Also added options:
  • Show avatar icons or remove them.
  • Show names always or only on hover.
  • Constant or alternate background color of posts. (By changing the background colors to different settings.)
  • Edit border thickness and color between reblogs.
